home.title: Your personal AI study assistant
home.subtitle: This is your personalized study area. Get precise summaries, tips for study materials, generate practice quizzes on any topic, and track your learning progress to ace your exams with confidence.

myNotebooks.title: My notebooks
myNotebooks.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the notebook "{{title}}"?
myNotebooks.subtitle: This is your study area. You can create, edit, and delete your notebooks. Inside each notebook, you can create, edit, and delete lessons. Clicking on an existing lesson will redirect you to the study area.
myNotebooks.tooltipNewNotebook: Create a new notebook. You can use notebooks to separate your studies by subject.
myNotebooks.tooltipNewLesson: Create a new lesson. You can use lessons to separate the topics of each subject.

deleteModal.bodyNotebook: Are you sure you want to delete this notebook? All its lessons and content will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
deleteModal.bodyLesson: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson?

subject.title: How would you like to study today?
subject.summaryDesc: Keep in mind the main topics of each class!

chat.summaryInitial: Hello! I'm Bob, the study assistant of Smart Study. I'm here to help! What topic would you like me to summarize today? Send me the subject for the summary.
chat.quizzInitial: Hello I'm Bob, the study assistant of Smart Study. This quiz has 8 questions, your progress will only be saved if you answer all of them. You can also review your answers by clicking on an completed attempt. Let's get started! What topic would you like to quiz yourself on? Send me the subject for the quiz.

quizzPage.title: {{lessonTitle}} - Quizzes
quizzPage.noAttempts: No quiz attempts yet. Start a new one!
quizzPage.saveSuccess: Your new attempt has been saved!

progress.title: My Progress
progress.subtitle: Here's a visual overview of your study performance.
progress.noDataSubtitle: It looks like you haven't completed any quizzes yet. Complete a quiz in one of your notebooks, and your progress will show up here!

card1.title: Overall Average by Notebook
card1.desc: A general comparison of your performance.
card1.legendText: This chart shows your overall average score for each notebook. Use it to quickly identify which subjects need more attention.

card2.title: Average Score by Lesson
card2.desc: Select a notebook to see the average for each lesson.
card2.noData: Select a notebook to see the chart.
card2.legendText: Filter by notebook to compare your average performance in each lesson, helping you pinpoint specific topics for review.

card3.title: Progress by Attempt
card3.desc: Select a notebook and a lesson to track your scores.
card3.noAttempts: This lesson has no quiz attempts yet.
card3.pleaseSelect: Please select a notebook and lesson.
card3.legendText: Filter by notebook and lesson to see the score progression for every single attempt. Perfect for tracking improvement on a specific topic.

myAccount.accessibilityHelpText: When activated, a helper widget will appear that will redirect the user to a site from their respective country, with the necessary tool for the best user experience.
